title: Test Login Successful
manualSteps: 1. Open a clean browser instance (Chrome/Firefox/Edge) in incognito/private mode.
2. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/ and wait until the page fully loads (verify the URL and that the login form is visible).
4. Clear any pre-filled text and type the exact value standard_user (case-sensitive, no leading/trailing spaces).
6. Clear any pre-filled text and type the exact value secret_sauce (case-sensitive).
7. Locate the Login button (text = "Login") and click it.
8. Wait for the browser to finish navigation and verify the new URL is https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html.
9. Confirm that the inventory page is displayed (e.g., page title contains "Swag Labs" and inventory items are visible).
10. Log the test result as PASS if all assertions succeed; otherwise FAIL with detailed notes.
